				<script type="text/javascript">
			$J( function() {
				BindAutoFlyoutEvents();

				var $Window = $J(window);
				var $Header = $J('#store_header');
				var $ResponsiveNavCtn = $J('#responsive_store_nav_ctn');
				var $HeaderWrapper;
				$Window.on('Responsive_SmallScreenModeToggled.StoreMenu', function() {
					var bUseSmallScreenMode =window.UseSmallScreenMode && window.UseSmallScreenMode();

					if ( !$HeaderWrapper )
						$HeaderWrapper = $Header.wrap( $J('<div/>', {'class': 'responsive_store_nav_ctn_spacer'} ) ).parent();

					if ( bUseSmallScreenMode )
						$ResponsiveNavCtn.append( $Header );
					else
						$HeaderWrapper.append( $Header );


					if ( bUseSmallScreenMode )
					{
						$Header.css( 'visibility', 'hidden' );
						$Header.show();
						var nMenuHeight = $J('#store_header' ).height() + $J('#store_header' ).offset().top;
						if ( $Window.scrollTop() < nMenuHeight )
							$Window.scrollTop( nMenuHeight - GetResponsiveHeaderFixedOffsetAdjustment() );

						$Header.css('visibility', 'visible');
					}
				} ).trigger('Responsive_SmallScreenModeToggled.StoreMenu');

									if( $J('#searchform').length > 0 )
					{
						var g_rgUserPreferences = {
							excluded_tags : [],
							excluded_content_descriptors : [3,4]						};
						EnableSearchSuggestions( $J('#searchform')[0].elements['term'], '1_4_4_', 'CN', 'german', g_rgUserPreferences, '6274734' );
					}
				

			} );
		</script>

	var g_AccountID = 0;

	<div class="steam_curators_ctn home_ctn" style="display: none">
		<div class="home_page_content">

			<div class="steam_curators_empty" id="steam_curators_empty" style="display: none">
				<h2><a href="https://store.steampowered.com/curators/" data-tooltip-text="Klicken Sie hier, um angesagte Steam-Kuratoren anzuzeigen">Steam-Kuratoren</a></h2>
				<p>Entdecken Sie durch Steam-Kuratoren neue Spiele. Folgen Sie Kuratoren und sehen Sie die Spiele, die diese empfehlen.</p>
				<p>Es gibt noch nicht genug Steam-Kuratoren, die hier angezeigt werden können. Klicken Sie <a href="https://store.steampowered.com/curators/">hier</a>, um mehr über Steam-Kuratoren zu erfahren und um zu lernen, wie Sie selbst ein Kurator werden können.</p>

			<div id="steam_curators_not_empty" class="" style="display: none">
									

<div class="curator_recommendation_capsule" >
	<div class="carousel_container paging_capsules" id="feature_curators_block_0" style="display: none;">
				<h2>
			<b>VORGESCHLAGENE</b> KURATOREN					</h2>
				<div class="carousel_items curator_featured_tags">

		</div>


		<div class="carousel_thumbs">

		</div>
		<div class="arrow left"><div></div></div>
		<div class="arrow right" ><div></div></div>
	</div>

	<div class="curator_ignored_all_recommended" id="feature_curators_ignored_block_0" style="display: none;">
		<h2><b>VORGESCHLAGENE</b> KURATOREN</h2>
		<div class="description">Sie haben eine große Anzahl von Steam-Kuratoren ignoriert. Vielleicht sind wir nicht gut darin, Ihnen interessante Kuratoren vorzuschlagen, oder Sie haben einfach kein Interesse am Kuratorsystem. Wie dem auch sei, wir werden Ihnen in diesem Bereich vorerst keine weiteren Kuratoren empfehlen. Wenn Sie Kuratoren, denen Sie folgen können, einsehen möchten, klicken Sie bitte <a href="https://store.steampowered.com/curators/recommendedcurators/">hier</a>.</div>
	</div>


	<script>
		var g_nNumIgnoredCurators = 0;
		var g_rgTopCurators = [];

		var fnCreateCapsule = function() {
			var strTemplate = "\r\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"curator_page\">\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"profile\">\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<a href=\"%6$s\"><img class=\"avatar\" src=\"%2$s\"><\/a>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"info\">\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"name\">%1$s<\/div>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"actions\">\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<div>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<a class=\" follow_button btn_green_white_innerfade btn_medium \" href=\"#\"><span>Folgen<\/span><\/a>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<a class=\" following_button btn_green_white_innerfade btn_medium \" href=\"#\"><span>Gefolgt<\/span><\/a>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<\/div>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"followers\"><span>%4$s<\/span> Follower<\/div>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"socialmedia\">%5$s<\/div>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<\/div>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<\/div>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"ignore_button_area\">\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<a class=\" ignore_button \" href=\"#\"><span>Kurator ignorieren<\/span><\/a>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<\/div>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<\/div>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"curations\">\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<\/div>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"ignored_banner\">\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"ignored_banner_title\">Kurator ignoriert<\/div>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"ignored_banner_desc\">%3$s<\/div>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<div><a class=\" btn_grey_white_innerfade btn_small_thin undo_ignore_button \" href=\"#\"><span>Ups. R\u00fcckg\u00e4ngig machen.<\/span><\/a><\/div>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<\/div>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t<\/div>";

			var elContainer = $J ( '#feature_curators_block_0 .carousel_items' );
			var elPipContainer = $J ( '#feature_curators_block_0 .carousel_thumbs' );

			var curators = ( typeof GHomepage !== 'undefined' ) ? GHomepage.rgTopSteamCurators : g_rgTopCurators;
			var numIgnoredCurators = ( typeof GHomepage !== 'undefined' ) ? GHomepage.nNumIgnoredCurators : g_nNumIgnoredCurators;
			var bShowAllRecommendations = 0;
			var bExpanded = ( typeof g_bCuratorClusterExpanded !== 'undefined' && g_bCuratorClusterExpanded );

			$J.each ( curators, function ( idx, curator ) {

				if ( !bShowAllRecommendations && curator.m_rgAppRecommendations.length < 4 )
					return;

				var strSocialMedia = '';

				if ( curator.facebook_page)
					strSocialMedia += '<div><img src="https://store.st.dl.bscstorage.net/public/images/v6/social/facebook_32_white.png"> ' + parseInt ( curator.facebook_page.fan_count ).toLocaleString () + '</div>';
				if ( curator.twitter )
					strSocialMedia += '<div><img src="https://store.st.dl.bscstorage.net/public/images/v6/social/twitter_32_white.png"> ' + parseInt ( curator.twitter.followers_count ).toLocaleString () + '</div>';
				if ( curator.youtube )
					strSocialMedia += '<div><img src="https://store.st.dl.bscstorage.net/public/images/v6/social/youtube_32_white.png"> ' + parseInt ( curator.youtube.subscriber_count ).toLocaleString () + '</div>';
				if ( curator.twitch )
					strSocialMedia += '<div><img src="https://store.st.dl.bscstorage.net/public/images/v6/social/twitch_32_white.png"> ' + parseInt ( curator.twitch.followers_count ).toLocaleString () + '</div>';


				var tagLineFollow = "Folgen Sie <span>%1$s<\/span> f\u00fcr weitere, \u00e4hnliche Reviews".replace ( /%1\$s/, V_EscapeHTML ( curator.name ) );
				var tagLineFollowing = "K\u00fcrzliche Reviews von <span>%1$s<\/span>".replace ( /%1\$s/, V_EscapeHTML ( curator.name ) );

				var elCapsule = $J ( strTemplate
					.replace ( /%1\$s/g, tagLineFollow )
					.replace ( /%2\$s/g, GetAvatarURL ( curator.strAvatarHash, '_medium' ) )
					.replace ( /%3\$s/g, "Dieser Kurator wird in Zukunft nicht mehr in den Empfehlungen angezeigt.".replace( /%1\$s/, V_EscapeHTML ( curator.link ) ) )
					.replace ( /%4\$s/g, curator.total_followers.toLocaleString () )
					.replace ( /%5\$s/, strSocialMedia )
					.replace ( /%6\$s/, GStoreItemData.AddNavEventParamsToURL ( curator.link, 'suggested_curator' ) )
				);

				$J('.ignore_button', elCapsule ).on('click', function() {
					IgnoreCuratorWithCallback( curator.clanID, true, function( bIgnored ){
						elCapsule.toggleClass( "ignored", bIgnored );
					});
					event.preventDefault();
				});

				$J('.undo_ignore_button', elCapsule ).on('click', function() {
					IgnoreCuratorWithCallback( curator.clanID, false, function( bIgnored ){
						elCapsule.toggleClass( "ignored", bIgnored );
					});
					event.preventDefault();
				});

				$J('.follow_button', elCapsule).on('click', function(){
					FollowCuratorWithCallback( curator.clanID, true, function(){
						elCapsule.addClass( "followed" );
						$J('.following_button', elCapsule).show();
						$J('.follow_button', elCapsule).hide();
						$J('.name', elCapsule).html( tagLineFollowing );
					});
					event.preventDefault();
				});

				$J('.following_button', elCapsule).on('click', function(){
					FollowCuratorWithCallback( curator.clanID, false, function(){
						elCapsule.removeClass( "followed" );
						$J('.follow_button', elCapsule).show();
						$J('.following_button', elCapsule).hide();
						$J('.name', elCapsule).html( tagLineFollow );
					});
					event.preventDefault();
				});

				if( typeof gFollowedCuratorIDs !== 'undefined' && gFollowedCuratorIDs && gFollowedCuratorIDs.hasOwnProperty( parseInt( curator.clanID ) ) )
				{
					curator.bFollowed = true;
				}

				if( typeof gIgnoredCuratorIDs !== 'undefined' && gIgnoredCuratorIDs && gIgnoredCuratorIDs.hasOwnProperty( parseInt( curator.clanID ) ) )
				{
					elCapsule.addClass( "ignored" );
				}

				if( curator.bFollowed )
				{
					elCapsule.addClass( "followed" );
					$J('.follow_button', elCapsule).hide();
					$J('.name', elCapsule).html( tagLineFollowing );
				}
				else
				{
					$J('.following_button', elCapsule).hide();
				}

				// Now add curations
				var elCurationContainer = $J ( '.curations', elCapsule );
				var cRecommendations = 0;
				$J.each( curator.m_rgAppRecommendations, function(idx, recommendation) {
					var elCapContainer = $J ( '<div></div>' );
					var el = GDynamicStoreHelpers.BuildCapsuleHTML ( 'suggested_curator_recommended', recommendation.appid, null, null, {
						discount_class: 'discount_block_inline corner_cap_discount',
						curator: curator.clanID
					} );

					var strColor = 'recommended';
					var strState = "Empfohlen";

					if ( recommendation.recommendation_state == 1 )
					{
						strColor = 'not_recommended';
						strState = "Nicht empfohlen";
					}
					else if ( recommendation.recommendation_state == 2 )
					{
						strColor = 'informational';
						strState = "Informativ";
					}


					var elRec = $J ( "\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=\"review_direction color_%2$s\">%3$s<\/span>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"text\">%1$s<\/div>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t".replace ( /%1\$s/, V_EscapeHTML (recommendation.blurb ) )
						.replace ( /%2\$s/g, strColor )
						.replace ( /%3\$s/g, strState )
					);

					elCapContainer.append ( el );
					elCapContainer.append ( elRec );

					elCurationContainer.append ( elCapContainer );

					if (++cRecommendations == 4)
						return false;
				});

				elContainer.append ( elCapsule );
				elPipContainer.append ( document.createElement('div') );
			} );

			if ( ( bShowAllRecommendations || numIgnoredCurators < 10 ) && curators.length != 0 )
			{
				$J ( '#feature_curators_block_0' ).parent ().parent ().parent ().show ();
				$J ( '#feature_curators_block_0' ).show();
				if( bExpanded )
				{
					$J ( '#feature_curators_block_0' ).addClass('curator_cluster_expanded');

					GDynamicStore.DecorateDynamicItems();
				}
				else
				{
					CreateFadingCarousel ( $J ( '#feature_curators_block_0' ), 0 );
				}
			}
			else if ( !bShowAllRecommendations && numIgnoredCurators != 0 )
			{
				$J ( '#feature_curators_block_0' ).parent ().parent ().parent ().show ();
				$J ( '#feature_curators_ignored_block_0' ).show();
			}
		}

		if( ( typeof GHomepage !== 'undefined' ) )
			GHomepage.AddCustomRender(  fnCreateCapsule );
		else
			GDynamicStore.OnReady( fnCreateCapsule );


	</script>
</div>				
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>

				<script type="text/javascript">
			$J( function() {
				BindAutoFlyoutEvents();

				var $Window = $J(window);
				var $Header = $J('#store_header');
				var $ResponsiveNavCtn = $J('#responsive_store_nav_ctn');
				var $HeaderWrapper;
				$Window.on('Responsive_SmallScreenModeToggled.StoreMenu', function() {
					var bUseSmallScreenMode =window.UseSmallScreenMode && window.UseSmallScreenMode();

					if ( !$HeaderWrapper )
						$HeaderWrapper = $Header.wrap( $J('<div/>', {'class': 'responsive_store_nav_ctn_spacer'} ) ).parent();

					if ( bUseSmallScreenMode )
						$ResponsiveNavCtn.append( $Header );
					else
						$HeaderWrapper.append( $Header );


					if ( bUseSmallScreenMode )
					{
						$Header.css( 'visibility', 'hidden' );
						$Header.show();
						var nMenuHeight = $J('#store_header' ).height() + $J('#store_header' ).offset().top;
						if ( $Window.scrollTop() < nMenuHeight )
							$Window.scrollTop( nMenuHeight - GetResponsiveHeaderFixedOffsetAdjustment() );

						$Header.css('visibility', 'visible');
					}
				} ).trigger('Responsive_SmallScreenModeToggled.StoreMenu');

									if( $J('#searchform').length > 0 )
					{
						var g_rgUserPreferences = {
							excluded_tags : [],
							excluded_content_descriptors : [3,4]						};
						EnableSearchSuggestions( $J('#searchform')[0].elements['term'], '1_4_4_', 'CN', 'french', g_rgUserPreferences, '6274734' );
					}
				

			} );
		</script>

		GStoreItemData.SetCurrencyFormatter( function( nValueInCents, bWholeUnitsOnly ) { var fmt = function( nValueInCents, bWholeUnitsOnly ) {	var format = v_numberformat( nValueInCents / 100, bWholeUnitsOnly ? 0 : 2, ".", ",");format = format.replace( ".00", '' ); return format; };var strNegativeSymbol = '';return strNegativeSymbol + "\u00a5 " + fmt( nValueInCents, bWholeUnitsOnly );} );

								<a class="btnv6_white_transparent btn_small btn_uppercase" href="https://store.steampowered.com/explore/"  data-tooltip-text="Click to learn more about your queue"><span>En savoir plus</span></a>
							</span>
				</h2>

				<div class="home_page_sign_in_ctn" id="discovery_queue_not_logged_in" style="display: none">
					<p>Connectez-vous pour voir et parcourir votre liste de découvertes personnalisées</p>
					<div class="signin_buttons_ctn">
						<a class="btn_green_white_innerfade btn_border_2px btn_medium" href="https://store.steampowered.com/login/">
							<span>Connexion</span>
						</a>
						<br><br>
						Ou <a href="https://store.steampowered.com/join/">inscrivez-vous</a> et rejoignez Steam gratuitement					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="discovery_queue_static" id="discovery_queue_static">
					<a id="discovery_queue_start_link" class="discovery_queue_overlay" onclick="BeginDiscoveryQueue( 0, this); return false;" href="https://store.steampowered.com/explore/">
						<div class="begin_exploring">
							Cliquez ici pour explorer votre liste de découvertes						</div>
					</a>
					<div class="discovery_queue" id="discovery_queue">

				<div class="discover_queue_empty" id="discovery_queue_empty" style="display: none">
					<h3>Vous avez consulté tous les produits se trouvant<br>dans votre liste de découvertes pour aujourd'hui.</h3>
					<p>Vous avez terminé votre liste pour aujourd'hui, mais si vous en voulez encore, vous pouvez cliquer ci-dessous pour en générer une nouvelle.</p>

	<div class="home_ctn ">
		<div class="big_buttons home_page_content">
			<h2>Parcourir Steam</h2>

						Nouveautés					</a>

					<a href="https://store.steampowered.com/genre/Free to Play/?snr=1_4_4_" class="big_button">

	<div class="steam_curators_ctn home_ctn" style="display: none">
		<div class="home_page_content">

			<div class="steam_curators_empty" id="steam_curators_empty" style="display: none">
				<h2><a href="https://store.steampowered.com/curators/" data-tooltip-text="Cliquez pour voir les meilleurs curateurs Steam">Curateurs Steam</a></h2>
				<p>Découvrez de nouveaux jeux grâce aux curateurs Steam. Suivez des curateurs et découvrez les jeux qu'ils recommandent.</p>
				<p>Il n'y a pas encore assez de curateurs Steam à afficher dans cet espace. En attendant, cliquez <a href="https://store.steampowered.com/curators/">ici</a> pour en savoir plus sur les curateurs Steam et découvrir comment devenir vous-même un curateur.</p>
			</div>
			<div id="steam_curators_not_empty" class="" style="display: none">
									

<div class="curator_recommendation_capsule" >
	<div class="carousel_container paging_capsules" id="feature_curators_block_0" style="display: none;">
				<h2>
			CURATEURS <b>SUGGÉRÉS</b>					</h2>
				<div class="carousel_items curator_featured_tags">

		</div>


		<div class="carousel_thumbs">

		</div>
		<div class="arrow left"><div></div></div>
		<div class="arrow right" ><div></div></div>
	</div>

	<div class="curator_ignored_all_recommended" id="feature_curators_ignored_block_0" style="display: none;">
		<h2>CURATEURS <b>SUGGÉRÉS</b></h2>
		<div class="description">Vous avez ignoré un nombre important de curateurs Steam. Il est possible que nous ne vous recommandions pas les curateurs appropriés, ou peut-être n'êtes-vous pas intéressé par les curateurs. Dans tous les cas, nous ne vous recommanderons plus aucun curateur dans cet espace. Si vous désirez trouver des curateurs à suivre, cliquez <a href="https://store.steampowered.com/curators/recommendedcurators/">ici</a>.</div>
	</div>


	<script>
		var g_nNumIgnoredCurators = 0;
		var g_rgTopCurators = [];

		var fnCreateCapsule = function() {
			var strTemplate = "\r\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"curator_page\">\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"profile\">\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<a href=\"%6$s\"><img class=\"avatar\" src=\"%2$s\"><\/a>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"info\">\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"name\">%1$s<\/div>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"actions\">\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<div>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<a class=\" follow_button btn_green_white_innerfade btn_medium \" href=\"#\"><span>Suivre<\/span><\/a>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<a class=\" following_button btn_green_white_innerfade btn_medium \" href=\"#\"><span>Suivi<\/span><\/a>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<\/div>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"followers\"><span>%4$s<\/span>abonn\u00e9s<\/div>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"socialmedia\">%5$s<\/div>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<\/div>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<\/div>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"ignore_button_area\">\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<a class=\" ignore_button \" href=\"#\"><span>Ignorer ce curateur<\/span><\/a>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<\/div>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<\/div>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"curations\">\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<\/div>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"ignored_banner\">\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"ignored_banner_title\">Curateur ignor\u00e9<\/div>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"ignored_banner_desc\">%3$s<\/div>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<div><a class=\" btn_grey_white_innerfade btn_small_thin undo_ignore_button \" href=\"#\"><span>Oups ! Annuler ceci.<\/span><\/a><\/div>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<\/div>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t<\/div>";

			var elContainer = $J ( '#feature_curators_block_0 .carousel_items' );
			var elPipContainer = $J ( '#feature_curators_block_0 .carousel_thumbs' );

			var curators = ( typeof GHomepage !== 'undefined' ) ? GHomepage.rgTopSteamCurators : g_rgTopCurators;
			var numIgnoredCurators = ( typeof GHomepage !== 'undefined' ) ? GHomepage.nNumIgnoredCurators : g_nNumIgnoredCurators;
			var bShowAllRecommendations = 0;
			var bExpanded = ( typeof g_bCuratorClusterExpanded !== 'undefined' && g_bCuratorClusterExpanded );

			$J.each ( curators, function ( idx, curator ) {

				if ( !bShowAllRecommendations && curator.m_rgAppRecommendations.length < 4 )
					return;

				var strSocialMedia = '';

				if ( curator.facebook_page)
					strSocialMedia += '<div><img src="https://store.st.dl.bscstorage.net/public/images/v6/social/facebook_32_white.png"> ' + parseInt ( curator.facebook_page.fan_count ).toLocaleString () + '</div>';
				if ( curator.twitter )
					strSocialMedia += '<div><img src="https://store.st.dl.bscstorage.net/public/images/v6/social/twitter_32_white.png"> ' + parseInt ( curator.twitter.followers_count ).toLocaleString () + '</div>';
				if ( curator.youtube )
					strSocialMedia += '<div><img src="https://store.st.dl.bscstorage.net/public/images/v6/social/youtube_32_white.png"> ' + parseInt ( curator.youtube.subscriber_count ).toLocaleString () + '</div>';
				if ( curator.twitch )
					strSocialMedia += '<div><img src="https://store.st.dl.bscstorage.net/public/images/v6/social/twitch_32_white.png"> ' + parseInt ( curator.twitch.followers_count ).toLocaleString () + '</div>';


				var tagLineFollow = "Suivez <span>%1$s<\/span> pour voir plus d'\u00e9valuations de ce genre".replace ( /%1\$s/, V_EscapeHTML ( curator.name ) );
				var tagLineFollowing = "\u00c9valuations r\u00e9centes de <span>%1$s<\/span>".replace ( /%1\$s/, V_EscapeHTML ( curator.name ) );

				var elCapsule = $J ( strTemplate
					.replace ( /%1\$s/g, tagLineFollow )
					.replace ( /%2\$s/g, GetAvatarURL ( curator.strAvatarHash, '_medium' ) )
					.replace ( /%3\$s/g, "Vous ne verrez plus ce curateur dans vos prochaines recommandations.".replace( /%1\$s/, V_EscapeHTML ( curator.link ) ) )
					.replace ( /%4\$s/g, curator.total_followers.toLocaleString () )
					.replace ( /%5\$s/, strSocialMedia )
					.replace ( /%6\$s/, GStoreItemData.AddNavEventParamsToURL ( curator.link, 'suggested_curator' ) )
				);

				$J('.ignore_button', elCapsule ).on('click', function() {
					IgnoreCuratorWithCallback( curator.clanID, true, function( bIgnored ){
						elCapsule.toggleClass( "ignored", bIgnored );
					});
					event.preventDefault();
				});

				$J('.undo_ignore_button', elCapsule ).on('click', function() {
					IgnoreCuratorWithCallback( curator.clanID, false, function( bIgnored ){
						elCapsule.toggleClass( "ignored", bIgnored );
					});
					event.preventDefault();
				});

				$J('.follow_button', elCapsule).on('click', function(){
					FollowCuratorWithCallback( curator.clanID, true, function(){
						elCapsule.addClass( "followed" );
						$J('.following_button', elCapsule).show();
						$J('.follow_button', elCapsule).hide();
						$J('.name', elCapsule).html( tagLineFollowing );
					});
					event.preventDefault();
				});

				$J('.following_button', elCapsule).on('click', function(){
					FollowCuratorWithCallback( curator.clanID, false, function(){
						elCapsule.removeClass( "followed" );
						$J('.follow_button', elCapsule).show();
						$J('.following_button', elCapsule).hide();
						$J('.name', elCapsule).html( tagLineFollow );
					});
					event.preventDefault();
				});

				if( typeof gFollowedCuratorIDs !== 'undefined' && gFollowedCuratorIDs && gFollowedCuratorIDs.hasOwnProperty( parseInt( curator.clanID ) ) )
				{
					curator.bFollowed = true;
				}

				if( typeof gIgnoredCuratorIDs !== 'undefined' && gIgnoredCuratorIDs && gIgnoredCuratorIDs.hasOwnProperty( parseInt( curator.clanID ) ) )
				{
					elCapsule.addClass( "ignored" );
				}

				if( curator.bFollowed )
				{
					elCapsule.addClass( "followed" );
					$J('.follow_button', elCapsule).hide();
					$J('.name', elCapsule).html( tagLineFollowing );
				}
				else
				{
					$J('.following_button', elCapsule).hide();
				}

				// Now add curations
				var elCurationContainer = $J ( '.curations', elCapsule );
				var cRecommendations = 0;
				$J.each( curator.m_rgAppRecommendations, function(idx, recommendation) {
					var elCapContainer = $J ( '<div></div>' );
					var el = GDynamicStoreHelpers.BuildCapsuleHTML ( 'suggested_curator_recommended', recommendation.appid, null, null, {
						discount_class: 'discount_block_inline corner_cap_discount',
						curator: curator.clanID
					} );

					var strColor = 'recommended';
					var strState = "Recommand\u00e9";

					if ( recommendation.recommendation_state == 1 )
					{
						strColor = 'not_recommended';
						strState = "Non recommand\u00e9";
					}
					else if ( recommendation.recommendation_state == 2 )
					{
						strColor = 'informational';
						strState = "\u00c0 titre d'information";
					}


					var elRec = $J ( "\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=\"review_direction color_%2$s\">%3$s<\/span>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"text\">%1$s<\/div>\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t".replace ( /%1\$s/, V_EscapeHTML (recommendation.blurb ) )
						.replace ( /%2\$s/g, strColor )
						.replace ( /%3\$s/g, strState )
					);

					elCapContainer.append ( el );
					elCapContainer.append ( elRec );

					elCurationContainer.append ( elCapContainer );

					if (++cRecommendations == 4)
						return false;
				});

				elContainer.append ( elCapsule );
				elPipContainer.append ( document.createElement('div') );
			} );

			if ( ( bShowAllRecommendations || numIgnoredCurators < 10 ) && curators.length != 0 )
			{
				$J ( '#feature_curators_block_0' ).parent ().parent ().parent ().show ();
				$J ( '#feature_curators_block_0' ).show();
				if( bExpanded )
				{
					$J ( '#feature_curators_block_0' ).addClass('curator_cluster_expanded');

					GDynamicStore.DecorateDynamicItems();
				}
				else
				{
					CreateFadingCarousel ( $J ( '#feature_curators_block_0' ), 0 );
				}
			}
			else if ( !bShowAllRecommendations && numIgnoredCurators != 0 )
			{
				$J ( '#feature_curators_block_0' ).parent ().parent ().parent ().show ();
				$J ( '#feature_curators_ignored_block_0' ).show();
			}
		}

		if( ( typeof GHomepage !== 'undefined' ) )
			GHomepage.AddCustomRender(  fnCreateCapsule );
		else
			GDynamicStore.OnReady( fnCreateCapsule );


	</script>
</div>				
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>

					</span>

				</h2>

						<div id="tab_upcoming_content_trigger" onclick="LoadDelayedImages('home_tabs'); HomeTabSelect( this, 'tab_upcoming_content' );" class="home_tab" data-usability="7"><div class="tab_content">Sorties attendues</div></div>
						<div id="tab_specials_content_trigger" onclick="LoadDelayedImages('home_tabs'); HomeTabSelect( this, 'tab_specials_content' );" class="home_tab" data-usability="8"><div class="tab_content">Offres</div></div>

		<div class="tab_item_cap">
			<img class="tab_item_cap_img" src="https://media.st.dl.bscstorage.net/steam/apps/748370/capsule_184x69.jpg?t=1558130177" >
		</div>
				<div class="discount_block tab_item_discount" data-price-final="5600"><div class="discount_pct">-30%</div><div class="discount_prices"><div class="discount_original_price">¥ 80</div><div class="discount_final_price">¥ 56</div></div></div>		<div class="tab_item_content">

		<a href="https://store.steampowered.com/app/790850/Undead_Horde/?snr=1_4_4__tab-PopularNewReleases" class="tab_item  "  data-ds-appid="790850" data-ds-tagids="[19,492,21,122,1659,11333,4182]" data-ds-crtrids="[396411]">
